content.text: I spent my summer eating burritos and traveling the world.
That sounds like an amazing summer! I hope you had a lot of fun!
I did! I went to a bunch of different countries and tried all sorts of new foods.
That's so awesome! I've always wanted to travel the world but I don't really have the money for it.
I know how you feel. I saved up for years to be able to do it.
Well, it sounds like it was worth it!
It was definitely! I'm so glad I went.
What was your favorite place that you visited?
That's a tough question! I loved all of them for different reasons.
I can imagine! I love trying new foods and learning about new cultures.
Yeah, me too! It's so much fun to experience different things.
I wish I could go with you sometime!
